What is BASS_ALAC?
==================
BASS_ALAC is an extension to the BASS audio library that enables the playback
of Apple Lossless Audio Codec streams.


What is ALAC?
=============
Please visit:

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apple_Lossless
